Title of Case Report
Author Name(s)
Affiliation(s)
Contact Email

Abstract
A brief summary of the case report, typically including a background, a summary of the case itself, and the conclusion or lesson learned.

Keywords: keyword1, keyword2, keyword3

1. Introduction
Introduce the patient's condition and why this case is unique or noteworthy.

2. Case Presentation
Provide a detailed account of the patient's medical history, physical examination, diagnostic tests, and treatment.

3. Discussion
Discuss the diagnosis, the rationale for treatment, and compare the case to existing literature.

4. Conclusion
Summarize the key takeaways from the case and the lessons learned.

References
List all cited sources.
